original_text: For the wrongdoer will be paid back for the wrong he has done, and there is no partiality.
korean_text: 불의를 행하는 자는 불의의 보응을 받으리니 주는 사람을 외모로 취하심이 없느니라

sentences.original_text: For the wrongdoer will be paid back
sentences.korean_translation: 악을 행하는 자는 벌을 받을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: for the wrong he has done
